title: How to Make Indian Mexican Chaat

steps.headline: Take a bowl (say about 50 grams) of black beans or rajma, whichever is easily available.
steps.description: Soak it overnight in water. If you want it to be soft, you can also boil it in a cooker or a microwave in the ordinary manner of cooking a vegetable.

steps.headline: Finely chop two fresh tomatoes into small pieces.
Finely chop two green capsicums into small pieces.
Mix the beans, capsicum and tomato in a bowl.
Add about half a cup of curd.
steps.description: Make sure that the mixture does not become watery. It should gain the consistency of a thick gravy.

steps.headline: Wash the mint leaves thoroughly and chop them into small pieces.
Add a little salt to taste and about a tablespoon of chat masala.
Let the mixture marinate for about ten minutes.
steps.description: It can be immediately used or stored in a fridge for up to two days and eaten anytime.

steps.headline: On each piece of Pringles chips, add a large spoon of the mixture.

text: Take a bowl (say about 50 grams) of black beans or rajma, whichever is easily available. Soak it overnight in water. If you want it to be soft, you can also boil it in a cooker or a microwave in the ordinary manner of cooking a vegetable. Finely chop two fresh tomatoes into small pieces.  Finely chop two green capsicums into small pieces.  Mix the beans, capsicum and tomato in a bowl.  Add about half a cup of curd. Make sure that the mixture does not become watery. It should gain the consistency of a thick gravy. Wash the mint leaves thoroughly and chop them into small pieces. Add this to the mixture. Add a little salt to taste and about a tablespoon of chat masala.  Let the mixture marinate for about ten minutes. It can be immediately used or stored in a fridge for up to two days and eaten anytime. Whenever you are ready to eat, lay out the Pringles chips (any flavour, e.g. Cream and Onion). Lay single pieces separately at a distance from each other on a plate. On each piece of Pringles chips, add a large spoon of the mixture. It should fit inside the chip and not spill outside. About 4-5 beans may fit on a chip. Now add some sev on it.  You are ready to serve and eat.  Finished.
